techmeme.title: Trump Media & Technology Group's stock jumps 30%+ in pre-market trading, hitting a $7B+ market cap, as Trump looks set to win; TSLA rises 13%+ pre-market (Bloomberg)
Elon Musk's gamble on Donald Trump pays off, as Trump looks set to win; Trump gave Musk a lengthy shout out in his victory speech, calling him "a super-genius" (Financial Times)
As Trump nears a US election win, Polymarket, Kalshi, PredictIt, and other prediction betting markets, which heavily favored Trump, are seemingly vindicated (Marc Hochstein/CoinDesk)
Nvidia closed up 2.9% at $139.93, hitting a $3.43T market cap and surpassing Apple at $3.38T and Microsoft at $3.06T; NVDA is up 850% since the end of 2022 (Ryan Vlastelica/Bloomberg)
Wise reports H1 2025 revenue up 19% YoY to £591.9M, profit up 55% YoY to £217.3M, and active consumer and business clients up 25% YoY to 11.4M (Ryan Browne/CNBC)
